displayProperties.description: "Funny thing, I know I've been to Io, but all the details are pretty hazy. Guess I'm getting old.  I have this memory of a battle on a bridge. Vex everywhere. After crossing a bridge, we took cover to the right, and then, well, it gets fuzzy from there. Maybe worth checking out?" â€”Cayde-6
